Producer: Graham Broadbent, Ben Cosgrove, Peter Czernin
Production Co: Revolution Studios, Blueprint Pictures, Section Eight Ltd.
Synopsis: Just before their university campus goes quiet for the winter break, a young woman (Emily Blunt) asks a classmate (Ashton Holmes) for a lift home. The two students set off on their trip and begin to get to know each other. But, when a reckless motorist drives them off the road, they find themselves stranded in the snow on a remote highway. As the night grows colder, the two are confronted by a horde of menacing apparitions -- and struggle to escape with their lives.
Title: Wind Chill
